welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guarapuava, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its beautiful natural landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Guarapuava has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Sabor Do Oriente
restaurants.description: Restaurante Sabor Do Oriente is a middle eastern restaurant located in Guarapuava.

restaurants.name: Casa Vecchia Restaurante
restaurants.description: Casa Vecchia Restaurante is a brazilian restaurant located in Guarapuava.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Guarapuava.
restaurants.address: R. Sen. Pinheiro Machado, 1505, Guarapuava, PR, 85010-100

restaurants.name: Dom Henrique Empório & Delicatessen
restaurants.description: Dom Henrique Empório & Delicatessen is a café located in Guarapuava.

restaurants.name: Essência do Sabor - Pães e Doces
restaurants.description: Essência do Sabor - Pães e Doces is a bakery located in Guarapuava.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tancredo Thomaz Faria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
